rows.label: qst201302_msg0001
rows.name: You saw the poster? Thanks for coming!

rows.label: qst201302_msg0002
rows.name:
It says you're looking for a
child. What exactly happened?

rows.label: qst201302_msg0003
rows.name:
Recently, my son and several other
children have gone missing.

rows.label: qst201302_msg0004
rows.name:
It's not often that a child
goes missing on Goldmund...

rows.label: qst201302_msg0005
rows.name:
I searched with the other parents,
but we couldn't find them anywhere.

rows.label: qst201302_msg0006
rows.name:
My wife is so worried about him, she
can hardly bring herself to eat.

rows.label: qst201302_msg0007
rows.name:
I can only imagine how
worried you must be.

rows.label: qst201302_msg0008
rows.name:
It's more than we can
handle on our own, so we
decided to look for help.

rows.label: qst201302_msg0009
rows.name: And that's why you put up the poster?

rows.label: qst201302_msg0010
rows.name: Yes, that's right.

rows.label: qst201302_msg0011
rows.name:
I'm sorry to ask, but would
you be willing to help us
search for the children?

rows.label: qst201302_msg0012
rows.name:
Yes, leave it to us. We will
bring the children back.

rows.label: qst201302_msg0013
rows.name: Thank you, I'm glad to hear it...

rows.label: qst201302_msg0014
rows.name: May I have your son's name?

rows.label: qst201302_msg0015
rows.name: His name is Shamal.

rows.label: qst201302_msg0016
rows.name:
He's curious and mischievous, but
he's a sweet, good-hearted boy.

rows.label: qst201302_msg0021
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: qst201302_msg0017
rows.name:
I'm going to search Goldmund
again. Could you ask around
on the first floor?

rows.label: qst201302_msg0018
rows.name:
The kids often played near the Exit
Dock and Return Port, so a merchant
might have seen something.

rows.label: qst201302_msg0019
rows.name:
Though with so many people coming
and going in Avaritia, it's doubtful
they'd remember everyone...

rows.label: qst201302_msg0022
rows.name: Understood. You can count on us.

rows.label: qst201302_msg0020
rows.name: Thank you. I'm counting on you.
